sense.def: Alternative Writing zhang li 瘴癧 , miasmatic pervasion-illness; Alternative Names zhang yi 瘴疫 , miasmatic epidemic; yi zhang 疫瘴 , epidemic miasma; wen zhang 瘟瘴 , warmth-illness miasma; wen zhang 温瘴 , warmth miasma. Pathological Condition brought forth by miasmatic qi with a high incidence of violent morbidity. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 1: 忽逢瘴癘，素不資貯，無以救療，遂拱手待斃，以致夭歿 , “If suddenly one is confronted with a miasmatic epidemic , and he has nothing in store, there is nothing that could bring help or a cure. All that remains is to expect early death submissively”.
